statements.query: MATCH (:AzureResourceGroup)<-[r:RESOURCE_GROUP]-(:AzureContainerRegistryReplication)<-[:CONTAIN]-(:AzureContainerRegistry)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AzureContainerRegistryReplication)<-[:CONTAIN]-(:AzureContainerRegistry)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureContainerRegistryReplication)<-[r:CONTAIN]-(:AzureContainerRegistry)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: $AZURE_TENANT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

name: cleanup Azure Container Registry Replication resources
